special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind.
descriptions: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Disintegration.
descriptions: If the duodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The duodrone makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks.

actions.name: Fist.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
